hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated:"I prayed with the Prophet both, while a resident and while traveling. So I prayed four for Zuhr with him as a resident, and two Rak'ah after it. I prayed two Rak'ah for Zuhr with him while traveling and two Rak'ah after it, and two Rak'ah for Asr, and he did not pray anything after it. Maghrib while a resident and traveling is the same; three Rak'ah, it is not decreased as a resident nor while traveling. It is Witr of the day, and after it are two Rak'ah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّطَوُّعِ فِي السَّفَرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Voluntary Prayers While Traveling
